targets.expr: count by (namespace) (count by (pod, namespace) (container_last_seen{node=~"$hostname", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}))
time() - avg by (namespace, pod, node) (container_start_time_seconds{node=~"$hostname", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"})
sum by ($group_by) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$hostname", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", image!=""}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by ($group_by) (container_memory_usage_bytes{node=~"$hostname", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", image!=""})
sum by ($group_by) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{node=~"$hostname", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", image!=""})
sum by ($group_by) (container_memory_rss{node=~"$hostname", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", image!=""})
sum by ($group_by) (container_memory_swap{node=~"$hostname", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", image!=""})

sum by ($group_by) (rate(container_memory_failures_total{node=~"$hostname", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", scope="container", failure_type="pgfault", image!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by ($group_by) (rate(container_memory_failures_total{node=~"$hostname", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", scope="container", failure_type="pgmajfault", image!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

list.name: group_by
list.query: namespace : namespace, pod : namespace\, pod, container : namespace\, pod\, container
